page.title: 03A TYPICAL WEEKEND
page.content: Usually spent at home or in the locality.Saturday often begins slowly with a walk over the fields to the post office at Freshford to get the weekend bread.This is something I very much like to do,no matter what the weather is like,after working indoors all week.This time of the year the garden takes a lot of time but it's nice to see things you have planted growing successfully_well mostly!House decoration takes time also and there is certainly enough this year to be done,but I certainly prefer gardening.Walking on a weekend afternoon with the family and friends is one of the best ways of taking advantage of living in this area, and having friends to visit for the weekend is one of the best ways of sharing it with them.
